plants.title: Aloe Vera
plants.description: Versatile plant that purifies the air and provides healing benefits for skin irritations.

plants.title: English Ivy
plants.description: Climbing plant that reduces mold and airborne fecal matter particles, ideal for bathrooms.

plants.title: Golden Pothos
plants.description: Trailing vine that cleans the air of carbon monoxide and formaldehyde.

plants.title: Gerbera Daisy
plants.description: Flowering plant that removes benzene and trichloroethylene from the air, ideal for bedrooms.

plants.title: Spider Plant
plants.description: Fast-growing plant known for removing carbon monoxide and xylene from the air.

plants.title: Boston Fern
plants.description: Effective at removing pollutants like formaldehyde and xylene while adding humidity to the air.

plants.title: Peace Lily
plants.description: Beautiful flowering plant that eliminates mold spores and improves indoor air quality.

plants.title: Dracaena
plants.description: Tough plant that filters out chemicals like trichloroethylene and xylene from the air.

plants.title: Philodendron
plants.description: Heart-shaped leaves that effectively remove formaldehyde from the air.

plants.title: Snake Plant
plants.description: Low-maintenance plant that filters formaldehyde and nitrogen oxide. Ideal for indoor air purification.

plants.title: Areca Palm
plants.description: Popular indoor plant that removes toxins such as benzene and carbon monoxide.

plants.title: Rubber Plant
plants.description: Large indoor plant known for removing toxins like formaldehyde and improving indoor air quality.

plants.title: Bamboo Palm
plants.description: Compact palm that improves indoor air quality by filtering benzene and formaldehyde.
